body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Reservations                Reservations       TURTLE WATCH RESERVATIONS: 2016 reservation dates & the phone number to call will be published here when available. June turtle watch reservations are normally taken in mid-May, and July turtle watch reservations are taken in mid-June.   CAMPING RESERVATIONS & INFORMATION: Visit www.recreation.gov or call 877-444-6777
title: Canaveral National Seashore: Reservations
